content: Where and when should we meet in March? We don't have to meet at Hamilton at 7pm on a Sunday, like usual. We can mix it up. :smile:
i can proabbly attend and potentially convince a +1 to join if its the weekend of the 7/8 or 14/15
@Dan that's around when you're giving your talk at SCALE SCALE, right?
seems like the 14/15 may work well if the goal is to wait till after SCALE
wait i fucked up the dates
Yeah, on the 14th I might need to drive my daughter to her flameworking class at 4 but my wife can probably do it. The 15th is open for me.
or i didnt....
But yeah, I was thinking we could get a lil' trip report after SCALE :smile:
the scale website has 2023 dates lol
https://www.socallinuxexpo.org/scale/20x/schedule/index.html
oh! I'm the one who f'ed that up
Here we go: March 5-8, 2026: https://www.socallinuxexpo.org/scale/23x
damn i thought remy was a presenter this year
my bad, I fixed the link above
all good haha
Do we want to meet in Coolidge Corner, like usual, or mix it up? I was sort of thinking about Time Out.
i can probably meet wherever. would definitely prefer places accessible via transit from like north cambridge but im interested enough that id be down to travel a little
oh i do have a potential conflict that weekend, but it should only be one day so ill try and figure that out. if the meetups are like late evening it should be fine
Time Out is cool. I'd be up for it.
Here's my talk btw https://www.socallinuxexpo.org/scale/23x/presentations/where-world-internet-box I didn't write this, I was sort of drafted into this.
very cool
If we stick with Sunday night, like usual, it sounds like we're talking about March 8th or 15th. Does anyone have a preference? Lately we've been meeting at 7pm.
march 8 doesnt have a potential conflict for me
